summary: Implemented user responses for Course refactoring. Updated Course model with getDynamicSEOData() method (replacing getSeoData()) to work with SEO helper. Updated Course show view to include video embed in Hero section with fallback to thumbnail, changed content to description, and added SEO integration via $page = $course. Updated IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS.md with user responses showing all decisions made: no data migration needed, Aparat/YouTube only, JSON format for prerequisites is perfect, SEO helper usage in views, and video embed display required.
current_status: Course refactoring fully implemented with all user requirements. Video embed displays in Hero section, SEO integration via helper, and all model methods properly configured. Ready for testing and migration execution.
